overview: From the Catskill Mountains to Johnny Carson’s couch, Buddy Hackett made America laugh! A Las Vegas institution for over five decades, his often risqué stories were softened by his unique delivery. On the heels of much acclaim from the Cable Ace nominated Buddy Hackett Live and Uncensored 1, Buddy and HBO paired again in ’85 recording Buddy Hackett Live and Uncensored 2.
title: Buddy Hackett: Live and Uncensored 2
